Summary: black sphere aprx 300 ft constant speed & altitude northeast direction
trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Costa Mesa
There were no other sightings in Costa Mesa on or around June 28th 2007
divs: sighting detailsi went out on our patio with mty coffe and looked towards the northwest to see if the cloud cover\marine layer looked like it would blow away and i saw the objet, i watched it as long as i could. i was closely wathing to see if it elevated, as the onlt explanation i could come up with is that it was possible somekind of balloon that got away from the fair grounds. it's path seemed unhindered in any way by the mild breeze. when the object was almost out of sight i thought i saw another smaller black objet connect with the sphere.
